did.unittitle: Brown, Timothy. No Hay Pura Luz

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pieces included: 1 score, 1 copy of the poem No hay pura luz with English translation, 1 program note for the song cycle Luces y sombras. Notes: CD, submission letter, and biographical note housed with String Quartet No. 2. Note on envelope: BT1.1 .03, BT1.2 .06, BT1.3 .04..
